column5: Private, separate entrance studio on the full second floor of our country house situated on 20 acres in bluebonnet country (midway between Houston and Austin). Complete with state-of-the-art kitchen, bathroom, and private balcony. Stay includes complimentary bottle of wine and breakfast & craft coffee at our local store, 290 From the Ground Up (5 minute drive). Attractions include local wineries, a lavender farm, the Blue Bell Creamery, and nearby Round Top, site of the annual antiques fair.
